Problem 1
```{r}
X <- 0:10
print(X)

test_scores <- seq(0, 100, by = 2)
print(test_scores)

pH <- seq(0, 14, 0.1)
print(pH)

game <- c("rock", "paper", "scissors", "lizard", "spock")
print(game)

clock <- seq(60, 0)
print(clock)

song <- c("I get knocked down", "But I get up again", "You're never gonna keep me down")
rep(song)

types <- c("A", "B", "AB", "O")
freqs <- c(40, 11, 4, 45)
rep(types, times = freqs)
```
